body:
I see. How about something like this:

```python
  def script(y1):
    x = aten::add(y1, 1, 1)
    z1 = aten::add(x, 5, 1)
    t9 = aten::lt(y1, 8)
    t10 = prim::TensorToNum(t9)
    t11 = t10
    t12 = y1
+   z = z1
    while t11:
      y2 = aten::add(t12, 1, 1)
      t17 = aten::lt(y2, 8)
      t18 = prim::TensorToNum(t17)
      t11 = t18
      t12 = y2
+     z = x
    return (x, z)
```

I think the extra assignments are necessary for correctness. A followup PR could deal with pruning the unnecessary ones / improving the naming.

+   z = z1
    while t11:
      y2 = aten::add(t12, 1, 1)
      t17 = aten::lt(y2, 8)
      t18 = prim::TensorToNum(t17)
      t11 = t18

+     z = x
    return (x, z)

I think the extra assignments are necessary for correctness. A followup PR could deal with pruning the unnecessary ones / improving the naming.

  def script(y1):

    z1 = aten::add(x, 5, 1)
    t9 = aten::lt(y1, 8)
    t10 = prim::TensorToNum(t9)
    t11 = t10
    t12 = y1
+   z = z1
    while t11:
      y2 = aten::add(t12, 1, 1)
      t17 = aten::lt(y2, 8)
      t18 = prim::TensorToNum(t17)
      t11 = t18
      t12 = y2
+     z = x
    return (x, z)
I think the extra assignments are necessary for correctness. A followup PR could deal with pruning the unnecessary ones / improving the naming.
